definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Modified methods and utilization of lignosulfonates were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了木素碘酸盐的改性方法与用途。

sentences.english: Insulin was labeled with horseradish peroxidase by sodium periodate oxidation method.
sentences.chinese: 用高碘酸钠氧化法将辣根过氧化物酶标记于胰岛素。

sentences.english: The reaction of potassium periodate and orange red can be catalyzed by nitrous ions.
sentences.chinese: 高碘酸钾与甲基红的反应可为亚硝酸根所催化。

sentences.english: To determine potassium iodate in edible salt, the specification of home-made capillary burette is 0.
sentences.chinese: 用该法测定食盐中的碘酸钾，当毛细滴管规格为0。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the stability of Potassium Iodate of different contents in pale vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 目的摸清碘酸钾加入白醋中不同含量的稳定性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish titrimetric method of periodic acid to determine contents of Inosine.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立高碘酸滴定法测定肌苷的含量。

sentences.english: The possibilities of formation of complex compound between divalent iodates have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 对二价碘酸盐之间形成复盐的可能性也进行了探讨。

definition: hydrohalic acid (e.g. hydrofluoric acid HF 氫氟酸|氢氟酸[qing1 fu2 suan1], hydrochloric acid HCl 盐酸 etc)
alkali salt (soda, lye, calcium carbonate etc)
